title: Digital Wellbeing will be able to dim your Android 13 wallpaper at night
content:
The latest Digital Wellbeing feature coming soon to Android 13 devices is the ability for Bedtime Mode to dim your wallpaper.

description: The latest Digital Wellbeing feature, coming soon to Android 13 devices, is the ability for Bedtime Mode to dim your wallpaper.
